title: Data Import Wizard
subtitle: Select a parser and provide the file path to process.

placeholder.result: No dataset parsed yet. Result preview will appear here.

helper.mockFile: Supports GenBank / GFF3 / JSON / CSV files. Use "Browse" to pick a local path.
helper.csvColumns: CSV files must include start and stop columns. Supplying name, type, strand, and color helps with richer maps.
